title: Battle of the Bulge: Winter War

sources.title: Battle of The Bulge: Winter War | Full War Movie | WW2 | Tom Berenger | Billy Zane
sources.description:
The Battle of The Bulge. Lt. Robert Cappa and his platoon of 2nd Infantry Division soldiers must defend a vital supply depot from being captured by attacking German soldiers.
**The film is under non-exclusive license from Cinedigm Corp.  All rights reserved**
2020.  Stars: Tom Berenger, Billy Zane, Steven Luke

metadata.Plot: During World War II, the Germans decide to launch one last big offensive. Lieutenant Robert Cappa and his platoon are given the responsibility of defending a vital supply depot.
metadata.Actors: Steven Luke, Tom Berenger, Billy Zane
